alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 02 at 3:28AM PST until December 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 32 degrees expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures of 26 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains and North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
